p:
As control, RICS analysis in non-transfected cells showed minimal autofluorescence signal and no correlations were detected. Also, RICS experiments performed with mCherry expressing cells, revealed autocorrelation functions providing an effective diffusion coefficient between 1 and 20 μm 2/s, which is consistent with the diffusion coefficient of similar fluorescent proteins reported previously
20, 21 . Similar results were obtained in transfected cells between 3 to 5 hours post transfection time.
